column4: hey, I downloaded a torrent of some stuff, but it came in image files.  It's supposed to be videos.  It won't let me burn to a DVD
nope, this is my Windows box
I'm home for Christmas, no linux here
both say it's an invalid image file type
the real problem is that I don't want to burn it
talk to the guys in ##windows please
and it doesn't matter if I am or not - this is not an ubuntu issue so ##windows is the place to be
